src:
Ingebrigtsens grusomme rekke fortsetter
K친re Ingebrigtsen og hans Oostende gikk p친 nytt tap.
02 Nov 2019, 22:06 by NTB
Oostende-trener K친re Ingebrigtsen fikk en sterk start i sin nye klubb i Belgia. Men s친 har det blitt full stopp. L칮rdag kveld tapte hans lag 0-1 borte for St. Truiden, og er uten seier p친 ni kamper.

Tr칮nderens mannskap st친r med fem strake tap, og har n친 blandet seg inn i bunnstriden. Laget ligger tredje sist, p친 14.-plass, p친 tabellen.

Oostende st친r med elleve poeng p친 14 kamper.

Ny nedtur for K친re Ingebrigtsen i Belgia

Nordmann scoret
For sunnm칮ringen Henrik Bj칮rdal ble det en langt bedre kveld. Han scoret sitt annet m친l for sesongen da hans Zulte Waregem slo Waasland-Beveren 2-1 p친 bortebane l칮rdag.

22-친ringen dukket opp p친 rett sted til rett tid da det var spilt 38 minutter. Skuddet til spissen Cyle Larin ble reddet av keeper, men p친 returen var Bj칮rdal f칮rst og trillet ballen i 친pent m친l til 1-0 for Zulte Waregem.

Det s친 lenge ut til at nordmannen skulle bli matchvinner. Ti minutter f칮r slutt vartet imidlertid hjemmelagets Aboubakary Koita opp med et kremmerhus av de helt sjeldne. Fra dr칮ye 35 meter sendte han av g친rde et skudd rett opp i det venstre krysset, utakbart for keeper Sammy Bossut.

K친re Ingebrigtsen sliter i Belgia: Sjette strake seriekamp uten seier



Henrik Bj칮rdal, her i aksjon for Norge, scoret sitt annet m친l for sesongen da Waregem slo Waasland-Beveren 2-1 p친 bortebane l칮rdag kveld.游닝 Foto: Barry Cronin / AFP / NTB scanpix

Men p친 overtid, etter at Bj칮rdal var byttet ut, satte canadiske Larin inn seiersm친let til 2-1 for Zulte Waregem, som med seieren klatrer opp til femteplass i den belgiske toppserien.
Kaptein Berge
Bj칮rdal scoret sitt f칮rste m친l for sesongen i den tredje serierunden da Sander Berge og Genk ble sl친tt 2-0.
L칮rdag bar Berge kapteinsbindet for Genk hele kampen da laget tapte 0-2 borte mot Eupen.
Simen Jukler칮d satt p친 benken og m친tte se Antwerpen tape 1-3 for Mouscron.
text:
Ingebrigten's gruesome series continues
K친re Ingebrigtsen and his Ostend lost again.
02 Nov 2019, 22:06 by NTB
Ostend coach K친re Ingebrigtsen got off to a strong start in his new club in Belgium. But then it has become a full stop. On Saturday night, his team lost 0-1 away to St. Truiden and is without a win in nine games.

Tronder's crew is facing five straight losses and has now interfered in the bottom fight. The team is third last, in 14th place, on the table.

Oostende stands with eleven points in 14 games.

New downturn for K친re Ingebrigtsen in Belgium

Nordmann scored
Henrik Bj칮rdal's health was a far better night. He scored his second goal of the season when his Zulte Waregem beat Waasland-Beveren 2-1 away on Saturday.

The 22-year-old appeared in the right place at the right time when it was played 38 minutes. The shot to the tip of Cyle Larin was saved by the keeper, but on the return Bj칮rdal was first to roll the ball into the open goal to 1-0 for Zulte Waregem.

It looked like the Norwegian would be a match winner for a long time. Ten minutes before, however, the home team's Aboubakary Koita woke up with a crematorium of the rare. From just over 35 yards, he sent off a shot straight up the left intersection, unbearable for keeper Sammy Bossut.

K친re Ingebrigtsen struggles in Belgium: Sixth straight series match without victory



Henrik Bj칮rdal, here in action for Norway, scored his second goal of the season when Waregem beat Waasland-Beveren 2-1 away on Saturday night.游닝 Photo: Barry Cronin / AFP / NTB scanpix

But in overtime, after Bj칮rdal was replaced, Canadian Larin set the 2-2 victory for Zulte Waregem, who with the victory climbs to fifth place in the Belgian top series.
Captain Berge
Bj칮rdal scored his first goal of the season in the third round when Sander Berge and Genk were beaten 2-0.
On Saturday, Berge bore the captain's tie for Genk the entire game as the team lost 0-2 away to Eupen.
Simen Jukler칮d sat on the bench and had to see Antwerp lose 1-3 for Mouscron.
